message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $87.50.
I see that you've adjusted your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. My counteroffer is now $86.
I'm still open to negotiating, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I'm willing to meet you at $86.25. This is my final adjustment before considering other options.
